sentence.text: To decipher a mechanism for this, we previously generated a mathematical model of how estrogen-mediated upregulation of the transcription factor, E2F6, upregulates the ovarian cancer stem/initiating cell marker, activation of MAPK activity, by epigenetic silencing the tumor suppressor miR-193a, and a competing endogenous (ceRNA) mechanism.

Interestingly, ChIP-PCR and bisulphite pyrosequencing showed that E2F6 also epigenetically suppresses miR-193a, through recruitment of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, and by a complex ceRNA mechanism in ovarian cancer cell lines.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
